reviewText:
I feel passionately about this movie. Very interesting point of view on the Iraqi war trough the eyes of a child.
the screenplay was incredibly well written. Italy, like I never seen before.
the tension was constant. I was on the 'edge of my seat' for the entire second half of the movie.
In short, I recommend this movie, you will enjoy it.
not as good as I expected after reading other reviews, but still a good movie and worth seeing.

This film shows the struggles that an Arab Iraqi girl and the disenfranchised share in modern Italy.
Has a nice artsy quality. Enjoyable!
